title: Minecraft: Nether Update (Original Game Soundtrack)
description: The official soundtrack for the Nether Update, featuring new ambient music and the iconic 'Pigstep'.

title: Minecraft: Caves & Cliffs (Original Game Soundtrack)
description: Music from the Caves & Cliffs update, adding new layers to the world's soundscape.

title: Minecraft: The Wild Update (Original Game Soundtrack)
description: Explore the wild with the soundtrack from The Wild Update.

title: Minecraft - Music Discs Vol. Alpha
description: A collection of the classic, original music discs from the early days of Minecraft.

title: Minecraft - Music Discs Vol. Beta
description: The newer generation of music discs added in later updates.
